summary: Allows arrows to be crafted at a forge.
descriptionHtml:
Adds the ability to create arrows at a forge.

Also adds \"Arrow Smithing\" to the Smithing Perk tree between \"Steel Smithing\" and \"Arcane Blacksmith\". This Perk has three levels, which increase the yeild of arrows when forging them.

Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=13393

==========
Perk Levels
==========
- 0: Standard (16 Arrows) [Default]
- 1: Double (32 Arrows) [Requires Level 30 Smithing]
- 2: Triple (48 Arrows) [Requires Level 45 Smithing]
- 3: Quintuple (80 Arrows) [Requires Level 75 Smithing]

=======
Recipes
=======
- Iron Arrows: Firewood, Iron Ingot
- Steel Arrows: Firewood, Steel Ingot, Iron Ingot
- Orcish Arrows: Firewood, Orichalum Ingot, Iron Ingot
- Dwarven Arrows: Firewood, Dwarven Metal Ingot, Steel Ingot, Iron Ingot
- Elven Arrows: Firewood, Refined Moonstone, Iron Ingot
- Glass Arrows: Firewood, Refined Malachite, Refined Moonstone
- Ebony Arrows: Firewood, Ebony Ingot
- Daedric Arrows: Firewood, Ebony Ingot, Daedra Heart

=====================
Chopping Block Locations
=====================
- Dragon Bridge (2): Outside the Lylvieve Family\'s House and in front of the Dragon Bridge Lumber Camp
- Embershard Mine (1): To the right of the path leading to the bandit and the door.
- Half-Moon Mill (1): Straight across from the house
- Riften (1): Next to the Blacksmith
- Riverwood (3): Around the Mill
- Whiterun (2): Behind Belethor\'s General Goods and in front of The Bannered Mare
- Windhelm (1): In an alley between Candlehearth Hall and the Marketplace Area
- Anga\'s Mill (2)
- Broken Oar Grotto (1)
- Druadach Redoubt Cave (1)
- Haafingar Stormcloak Camp (1)
- Hall of the Vigilant (1)
- Morthal (2)
- Uttering Hills Cave (1)

=================
Manual Installation
=================
Download the .zip file and place the extracted .esp file into your Skyrim Data folder

========
Warnings
========
- This mod adds a perk to the Smithing Tree. Other mods that modify the Smithing Tree may conflict with this mod. Mods that effect other trees should work just fine.
- Due to adding a perk, if you remove this mod, you\'ll lose any perks you\'ve invested into Arrow Smithing. Other perks and trees should be uneffected.
- Adding this mod after having Arcane Enchantment is fine. You\'ll just have the perk without any perks in Arrow Smithing
author: Deathwishez
